Name: Occupational Hazards: Episode 1
About the game: Occupational Hazards Episode 1 is an adult-only furry themed mix of a visual novel and a text based RPG with strong focus on sexual content. The main gameplay loop consists of picking a planet to travel to, where you will encounter a unique scenario, and get a choice of how to react in said scenario. Every choice has a unique outcome, and while the game's story is conveyed mainly through text, art accompanies every scenario.
